title: Akachan to Boku (Baby and Me)
synopsis: Takuya Enoki is living a difficult life for a fifth grader. His mother passed away in a tragic car accident a few months ago, forcing him to pick up the slack and take care of his baby brother, Minoru, as his father works the endless hours typical of a Japanese salaryman.
characters: ['Enoki, Minoru', 'Enoki, Takuya', 'Enoki, Harumi', 'Fujii, Akihiro', 'Fujii, Ichika', 'Enoki, Yukako', 'Gotou, Hiroko', 'Fukaya, Shinako', 'Tamadate, Tokio', 'Gotou, Tadashi']
